title: Bug 7581 - ComboBoxCellEditor does not resize correctly in property sheet
description: From ECJoe Winchester <JoeWin@us.ibm.com wrote in message news:3C407F76.31A82113@us.ibm.com...
OB: When using the ComboBoxCellEditor in the property sheet, it does not resize correctly.
EB: The ComboBoxCellEditor should resize according to the width of the cell in the property sheet.
SR:
Steps to reproduce: 
1. Open the property sheet. 
2. Add a property with a ComboBoxCellEditor as its editor. 
3. Make sure the property value is wider than the cell. 
4. Observe that the ComboBoxCellEditor does not resize to fit the cell correctly.
